patthana23.8:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.8:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.8:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nevadassanena nabhāvanāya
